p: For HPLC, about 20 mg of each sample treatment was added to microcentrifuge tube containing 1 mL of 70% ( v/ v) methanol. This solution was incubated in an ultrasonic bath at 55 °C for 15 min, and then centrifuged at 12,000 rpm and 25 °C for 10 min. The supernatant was filtered using 0.22 µm PTFE Millipore syringe filters and later on, HPLC analysis was done by running all of samples in triplicate.
